marklogic.body: Wow - really tasty - had to use tinned rhubarb as no fresh but made no difference to outcome - just would have preferred a bit of red colouring as dull green tinned rhubarb not so attractive, but taste wonderful and very filling - easily served 8.Â The blind baking of pastry beforehand saves it getting soggy and excellent tip to trim it after baking so as to avoid shrinkage. The custard amazingly orangey aftert just adding the to it. Â Saved a Slice to next day and highly recommended as a Cold dish.Â
